title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Teaching (BT) Design and Genetic Algorithm (GA) Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills, foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical), and self-directed learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can understand blended instruction design principles and create at least three mobile-optimized BT (Blended Teaching) lecture materials.
Learners can achieve an average fitness score of 0.85 or higher when designing learning paths using a genetic algorithm (GA)-based optimization tool.
Learners can demonstrate a 5% improvement in average scores and a 20% reduction in learning deviation compared to previous results through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
